PhD Mechanical Engineering, University of Liverpool, United Kingdom
Programme Director - UofG BEng (Hons) Mechanical Design Engineering
Recipient of Tan Chin Tuan Fellowship for research attachment in USA.
Awarded British Gas Corporation Scholarship for research on modeling the dispersion of hazardous negatively buoyant plume in the atmosphere.
Recipient of Asian Productivity Organisation Training Award sponsored by Asian Productivity Organisation (APO Japan), China Productivity Centre (Taiwan) and Nanyang Technological University.
Fellow, The Institution of Mechanical Engineers, U.K (F.I.Mech.E.)
Members, American Society of Mechanical Engineers (M.A.S.M.E.)
Senior member, Society of Manufacturing Engineers (Sr.M.S.M.E.)
Senior member, The Institution of Engineers, Singapore (Sr.M.I.E.S.)
Member, The Chartered Management Institute, U.K. (MCMI)
Technical mentor and judge for the Earthlink NTU-A*STAR Solar Innovations ’2002 national competition
Member of the International Program Committee (IPC) for the IASTED - International Association of Science and Technology for Development is based in Calgary, Canada
Assessor panel member for FIMechE applications
Executive council member of the I.Mech.E., Singapore
Served on the conference advisory panel of three Automation-in-Manufacturing (AIM) international conferences organized by SIAA

Course instructor for Pneumatic and Electropneumatic Control (intermediate level) for industry organised by Singapore Industrial Automation Association (SIAA) and Society of Manufacturing Engineers (SME)
Course instructor for Assembly Automation course for industry
Conducted course on Compressed Air System under Executive Program on Energy Management for PUB staff
Conducted Common Air Platform Engineering (CAPE) course for RSAF officers at Air Force School, Singapore
Judge for the Mechatronics World Skills Competition. Three years
Editor of the Singapore Industrial Automation Association (SIAA) newsletter. Four years
Executive council member of the Singapore Industrial Automation Association (SIAA). Five years
Consultancies for several companies on automation related projects
Development projects for the remote regions
Competition Awards Won by Project Students
2nd prize award in final-year project poster oral presentation competition (out of 150 project presentations) organised by University of Glasgow, Singapore, 2014.
2nd prize award in Automatic Window Cleaning System project and showcased at the Singapore Science Centre (1990).
Institution of Engineers (IES), Singapore, paper, merit award 2002.
Institution of Engineers (IES), Singapore, best paper award 2003.
Institution of Engineers (IES), Singapore best paper award 2004.
1st prize award in MAE Blitz 2010 Super Transportation National Competition organized by NTU in Sep 2010.

1st prize award in Green Innovation Showcase National Competition organised by Singapore Space and Technology Association and Singapore Airshow Pte Ltd, Feb 2010. Project was showcased at the Singapore Airshow 2010 in Changi.
Tan Kah Kee Young Inventor’s National Award (2012) for a wheelchair project for the disabled. Showcased at the Singapore Science Centre.
1st prize award in final-year project poster oral presentation competition (out of 94 project presentations) organised by University of Glasgow, Singapore, 2013.
